Class MapParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.MapParser
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EditMap

    public class MapParser
extends java.lang.Object
    The Map Parser utility parses the whole map file from disk.
    Author:
    v_valla

      • loadMap

        public static GameMap loadMap(java.lang.String fileName)
                       throws java.io.IOException,
                              java.lang.Exception
        Loads the map file and parses it.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the location of the map file to be parsed
        Returns:
        GameMap the parsed GameMap Object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when file location/contents are invalid
        java.lang.Exception - when map file doesn't contain all the required sections

      • deserializeCountry

        private static Country deserializeCountry(java.lang.String countryLine,
                                          java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> continentNames)
        This deserializes the country line from the file into a Country object.
        Parameters:
        countryLine - the raw line from the file.
        continentNames - the names of all continents
        Returns:
        A continent object

      • deserializeBorder

        private static java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<java.lang.String>> deserializeBorder(java.lang.String borderLine,
                                                                                                       java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> countryNames)
        This deserializes the border line from the file into a Border object.
        Parameters:
        borderLine - the raw line from the file.
        countryNames - A list of country names.
        Returns:
        An entry object, key is the name and the value is a Set of borders.
